text: Wolfgang Bötsch (8 September 1938 – 14 October 2017) was a German politician. He was born in Bad Kreuznach. He was a representative of the Christian Social Union of Bavaria. Between 1974 and 1976 he represented the Landtag of Bavaria. From 1976 to 2005 he was a member of the Bundestag, and between 1993 and 1997 he was the last Minister of Post and Telecommunications.„Ende einer Epoche: Verabschiedung des letzten Postministers - 17.12.1997“, Post und Telekommunikation Bötsch died on 14 October 2017 in Würzburg, Germany at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Government ministers of Germany Category:Politicians from Rhineland-Palatinate Category:Politicians of the Christian Social Union of Bavaria
title: Wolfgang Bötsch
